title: Revenue KPI
subTitle: Tracking revenue trends
description: A comprehensive KPI for monitoring and analyzing revenue fluctuations.

businessQuestions.title: What is the revenue trend this month?
businessQuestions.description: The KPI provides insights into revenue changes compared to previous months.

businessQuestions.title: How does this year's revenue compare to last year?
businessQuestions.description: Analyze the yearly revenue growth using this KPI.

calculations.Total Profit: Calculated as total revenue minus total expenses for the month.
calculations.Total Profit (Last Month): Derived from the revenue and expense data for the previous month.
calculations.Total Profit (Last Year): Summation of monthly profits from the previous year.
